component.name: Fresh
component.summary: A lightweight, fast terminal-based text editor with LSP support

description.p: Fresh is a modern terminal-based text editor designed for discovery and ease of use. It features native UIs, a full menu system, and a powerful Command Palette with full mouse support.

ul.li: Low-latency performance with large file support (multi-gigabyte files)
Language Server Protocol (LSP) integration for code intelligence
TypeScript plugins running in a sandboxed Deno environment
Git integration (file finder, grep, log, blame)

description.p: Latest release with bug fixes and improvements.
